alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 26 at 3:30PM MDT until October 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower Washington County near north-south running canyons. Those in St. George proper are unlikely to see strong winds. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. If in areas normally impacted by gap winds, secure outdoor objects including Halloween decorations, trampolines, and outdoor furniture.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
